mapper.insert: insert into ecs_shipping (shipping_id, shipping_code, shipping_name, shipping_desc, insure, support_cod, enabled, print_bg, print_model, shipping_order, support_pickup, supplier_id, is_default_show, shipping_print, config_lable ) values (#{shipping_id,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{shipping_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shipping_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shipping_desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{support_cod,jdbcType=BIT}, #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, #{print_bg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{print_model,jdbcType=BIT}, #{shipping_order,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{support_pickup,jdbcType=BIT}, #{supplier_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{is_default_show,jdbcType=BIT}, #{shipping_print,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{config_lable,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
